text: People.ai collects information and data for the purpose of creating our graph database and providing the Services.

4. WHAT DATA WE COLLECT
For each of the categories of information, above, we collect the information from a variety of sources, including directly from you, from your devices, from your social media profiles, from our Customers, and/or from third party providers.
This privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") is intended to help you understand what data we collect, what we do with it, how we protect it, and what choices you have with regard to our collection and processing of your data through your use of our services (the "Services") through the People.ai website https://people.ai (the "Website"), and the People.ai application https://app.people.ai (the "App") (collectively referred to as the "Sites").
We collect information and data to help us compile, organize, and verify this information.
For example, we may collect browser information, device data, logs, IP addresses, the page of the Sites you request, the date and time of the request, and the time spent on the Sites or page.
If we determine that the request warrants a fee, we will tell you why we made that decision and provide you with a cost estimate before completing your request.

data_type: customer data we collect about you
text: Please note, we may transfer the Customer Data we collect about you to countries other than the country where we originally collected it for the purposes processing the data and operating the Services.
For example, we may collect browser information, device data, logs, IP addresses, the page of the Sites you request, the date and time of the request, and the time spent on the Sites or page.
We may collect data on how you use the Sites, to improve the Sites and the Services.

data_type: demographic information about user as whole
text: The cookies also help People.ai analyze trends, track user movement in the site, and gather demographic information about our users as a whole.
For example, we may collect browser information, device data, logs, IP addresses, the page of the Sites you request, the date and time of the request, and the time spent on the Sites or page.
